summary.span: 自動產生單一資料表命令，可用來調解對 的變更和相關的資料庫。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 衍生的參數已加入到 的 集合。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 從 中指定的預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 擷取參數資訊，並填入 (Populate) 指定 物件的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會覆寫任何現有參數資訊。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要資料庫的額外呼叫以取得資訊。 requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information. 如果事先已知參數資訊，它會更有效率的方式藉由明確設定的資訊填入參數集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用預存程序。You can only use with stored procedures. 您無法使用填入使用任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand GetDeleteCommand(bool useColumnsForParameterNames) cil managed
Public Function GetDeleteCommand (useColumnsForParameterNames As Boolean) As OracleCommand

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 若為 ，會在可行的情況下產生符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

span.span: to generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
to generate @p1, @p2, and so on.

summary.span: 取得在資料庫上執行刪除時所需之自動產生的 物件。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions on the database.

returns.span: 自動產生的 物件，執行刪除時所需要的。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用告知性或疑難排解的方法之用，因為它會傳回来執行的物件。You can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您也可以使用做為基礎的修改過的命令。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，您可能會呼叫並修改值，並接著上明確設定， 。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 應用程式會呼叫其中一個時，會先產生 SQL 陳述式或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用`@p1`， `@p2`，依此類推，各種參數。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on, for the various parameters. 傳遞`true`for`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 符合下列條件時，才會如此成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 產生的參數名稱符合指定準則規則運算式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - A指定。A is specified. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).

summary.span: 在正確目錄案例中提供不具引號的識別項時，傳回該識別項具引號的正確格式，包括適當逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.

value.span: 當做結構描述分隔符號使用的字元。

span.span: The character to be used as the schema separator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，資料庫伺服器會表示為識別項的結構描述分隔從具有某些字元之識別項的結構描述名稱。Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character. 例如，SQL Server 使用冒號，建立完整的識別項，例如 Person: CustomerName，其中 「 Person 」 是結構描述名稱，而"CustomerName"為識別項。For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier. 設定這個屬性可讓開發人員可以修改此行為。Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetRowUpdatingHandler(class System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter adapter) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetRowUpdatingHandler (adapter As DbDataAdapter)
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string UnquoteIdentifier(string quotedIdentifier) cil managed
Public Overrides Function UnquoteIdentifier (quotedIdentifier As String) As String

param.name: quotedIdentifier
param.span: 將移除其內嵌引號的識別項。

span.span: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.

summary.span: 已提供引號識別項時，傳回該識別項不具引號的正確格式，包括不逸出識別項中的任何內嵌引號。

span.span: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

returns.span: 不具引號的識別項，會適當包含內嵌的引號。

span.span: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
